project-description.Issuezy: A full-stack project management and issue tracking app where you can keep your team organized. The first release of the project was completed in one month.
project-description.HowTo: A SPA website for users to discover and craft unique step-by-step tutorials. Designed and developed from scratch without any guidance in eight one-week sprints.
project-description.Alpha Twitter: A collaborative simple Twitter clone with front-end and back-end trainees at Alpha Camp. Completed within 2 weeks using Agile development methodology.
